Text.Name: Item_Cape_Nomal1
Text.Desc: A mantle for decoration, a famous style among Cultivation Realm.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Nomal2
Text.Desc: A mantle for decoration, a famous style among Cultivation Realm.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Nomal3
Text.Desc: A mantle for decoration, a famous style among Cultivation Realm.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Nomal4
Text.Desc: A mantle for decoration, a famous style among Cultivation Realm.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp1
Text.Desc: A mantle with exquisite pattern, with is the symbol of KunLun Fair Spell winner.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp2
Text.Desc: A symbol of beating the Phoenix. The pattern on the mantle is a nature appearance of the essence within its body and looks pretty mysterious.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp3
Text.Desc: A symbol of beating the Flood Dragon. The pattern on the mantle is a nature appearance of the essence within its body and looks pretty mysterious.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp4
Text.Desc: A mantle with exquisite pattern, with is the symbol of KunLun Fair Arifact Craft winner.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp5
Text.Desc: A mantle with exquisite pattern, with is the symbol of KunLun Fair Alchemy winner.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp6
Text.Desc: A mantle with exquisite pattern, with is the symbol of KunLun Fair Artifact winner.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp7
Text.Desc: A mantle comes from other world. Its pattern means winter is over and spring is coming and everything is coming out.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp8
Text.Desc: A symbol of beating the Torch Dragon. The pattern on the mantle is a nature appearance of the Yin essence within its body and looks pretty mysterious.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp9
Text.Desc: A symbol of beating the Torch Dragon. The pattern on the mantle is a nature appearance of the Yang essence within its body and looks pretty mysterious.

Text.Name: Item_Cape_Sp10
Text.Desc: A mantle with exquisite pattern, with is the symbol of KunLun Fair Debate winner. It is said that Follow ancient path and conquer the present, to know the ancient is to know the Tao Principles.
